title: Rihanna is the queen of side-eye at dinner at Giorgio Baldi
text:
That look though. (Picture: Backgrid)

Rihanna just gives us more reasons to love her every day.

And today’s entry to that file is – she is the queen of side-eye.

The 31-year-old proved that she can destroy a person with a look like no other as she hit up her favourite restaurant, Giorgio Baldi, in Santa Monica.

Rihanna was serving us Diana Ross vibes as she attended the restaurant in a gold jumpsuit.

The Work singer paired the statement one-piece with a white handbag, gold stilettos and hoop earrings, while she wore a sweep of gold eyeshadow and a brown lip.

Rihanna slayed in this gold jumpsuit (Picture: Roger / NGRE / BACKGRID)

That is a true skill (Picture: Roger / NGRE / BACKGRID)

Leaving her hair naturally curly, Riri’s look screamed disco – but her face screamed ‘what are you doing’, as she gave a blistering side-eye to the paparazzi.

It’s truly a superhero skill.

Rihanna arrived at the Italian restaurant after it had closed but obviously she was not turned away, as she was seen laughing away with friends in the family-run eatery.

Well, who’s going to deny Riri her risotto, even if you have closed?

Rihanna pretty much destroyed a follower who made a dig about her forehead (Picture: Instagram)

The Fenty mogul has been on fire with the sass this week, particularly after she destroyed a follower who mocked her forehead.

On a video where the sun reflected off Rihanna’s forehead, somebody commented: ‘Ur forehead shines brighter than my future.’

But Rihanna wasn’t about to let that one slide and replied: ‘There’s still hope for you then.’

Ouch.

However, there’s also been some slight drama, after the popstar’s image was used to promote a sex toy – and we’re pretty sure Riri didn’t know about it.

A woman discovered that an artificial vagina made by the company Liaoyang Biale used Rihanna’s image on the box, while perusing adult items in Texas.

The S&M singer hasn’t ventured into the sex toy business just yet, but does feature a range of naughty accessories on her Savage x Fenty website.

The range sells riding crops, whips, blindfolds, handcuffs, restraints and crotchless underwear for those wanting to spice up their bedroom with some Bad Gal Riri flair.
